author: Alexandra Kerr
title: Warren Buffett: InvestoTrivia Part 1
text: Take Investopedia's video trivia on Warren Buffett. Insights Part 3 of Investopedia's Warren Buffett trivia series. Small Business What would you ask this legendary investor, especially if you were told you could only ask five questions? Investing The "Oracle of Omaha" is one of the most successful investors of all time. No wonder so many investors are mimicking his investments. Find out who Buffett's imitators are and how they're doing. ... Investing The Oracle of Omaha can move over - there's a new investor in town. Managing Wealth You may think the recent financial meltdown changed things, but don't be fooled: those unfussy sayings from the Oracle of Omaha still rule. Managing Wealth Though he's an investing icon, critics are pointing to several past events that signal Buffett's reign may be ending. Investing Even Warren Buffett, the greatest investor of our time, has made many unforced errors. Investors can learn from his mistakes of omission and commission. Insights Warren Buffett remains calm and upbeat on the economy ahead of Berkshire Hathaway's earnings and annual meeting. Trending
